author: @KTTCTV
title: 4-year-old and infant in Colorado found safe after endangered missing alert
text: 4-year-old and infant in Colorado found safe after endangered missing alert STERLING, Colo. ( [KKTV](https://www.kktv.com/2023/12/28/statewide-alert-issued-colorado-missing-4-year-old-infant/)/Gray News) - A statewide alert issued in Colorado on Thursday for two young children has been canceled, [KKTV reports.](https://www.kktv.com/2023/12/28/statewide-alert-issued-colorado-missing-4-year-old-infant/) The Colorado Bureau of Investigation issued an alert for 4-year-old Zuryah Thalacker and 23-month-old Ansom Thalacker. Officials say the two children were located and were safe as of 3 p.m. on Thursday. Officials say the children have been missing since Wednesday at 1:30 p.m. when they were last seen in the Sterling area. The alert stated that the children may have been with 28-year-old Justina Lambert. The CBI did not disclose the relationship between the three in the alert. The alert said the children were believed to be traveling in a 2007 White Nissan Murano with CA license plate 9ERA912, with the rear bumper missing. Copyright 2023 KKTV via Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: israel garcía
title: ¡Netflix confirma la noticia! Habrá tercera temporada de 'Merlina'
text:
¡Netflix confirma la noticia! Habrá tercera temporada de ‘Merlina’
Un elenco de lujo para la nueva temporada: el regreso de Catherine Zeta‑Jones, Luis Guzmán y Steve Buscemi refuerza la ambición de Netflix en seguir expandiendo el legado de la Familia Addams
Aún no se estrena la segunda temporada y Netflix ya anunció por todo lo alto la tercera temporada de ‘Merlina’, una de sus series más exitosas, dirigida por Tim Burton y protagonizada por Jenna Ortega.
“Estamos encantados de que regrese para recorrer los pasillos de Nevermore en la tercera temporada. Esta vez, desenterrará más secretos siniestros dela escuela y se adentrará aún más en la cripta de la familia Addams”, indicaron en un comunicado los creadores, guionistas y showrunners Alfred Gough y Miles Millar.
El anuncio llega a dos semanas del estreno de la primera parte de la segunda temporada de esta serie, que sigue a la adolescente Merlina Addams, interpretada por Ortega, quien regresa para merodear por los pasillos góticos de la Academia Nevermore, donde la esperan nuevos enemigos y problemas, según el comunicado.
¿CUÁNDO ESTRENA LA NUEVA TEMPORADA DE ‘MERLINA’?
La segunda parte se estrenará el 3 de septiembre con un reparto que incluye a Emma Myers como su compañera de habitación mujer lobo, Enid; Hunter Doohan como Tyler Galpin; y el puertorriqueño Luis Guzmán y Catherine Zeta-Jones en los papeles de Gómez y Morticia Addams.
Inspirada en la ‘Familia Addams’, la serie se estrenó el 23 de noviembre de 2022 y actualmente ostenta el récord del programa en inglés más popular de la plataforma, con 252.1 millones de visitas en 91 días.
TE PUEDE INTERESAR: ¿Nueva adaptación épica o decepcionante? Lidera Pedro Pascal la misión de ‘Los 4 Fantásticos: Primeros Pasos’
También alcanzó el puesto número uno en 90 países y superó la marca de los mil millones de horas vistas solo tres semanas después de su debut, según datos de la plataforma. (Con información de EFE)

author: financialcontent.com
title: Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu Offers Free Consultations for Immigration and Family Law Services | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu offers FREE consultations for Immigration & Family Law. Expert guidance for a brighter future!
The Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu, a distinguished legal practice based in New York, is excited to announce its commitment to providing free consultations for individuals seeking assistance in immigration and family law matters. With a focus on helping those in need, Attorney Ghenadie Rusu is extending this offer to support individuals looking for guidance on Adjustment of Status (Green Card) and Special Immigrant Juvenile Status cases.
Immigrating to the USA can be a complex process, and the Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu understands the importance of reliable legal representation. Whether individuals are navigating the path to Green Card status or require assistance with Special Immigrant Juvenile Status, Attorney Ghenadie Rusu is here to offer expert legal counsel.
"Empowering individuals with the right legal support is crucial, especially in immigration and family law matters. We are pleased to provide free consultations to those in need, ensuring they have the information and guidance necessary to make informed decisions," said Attorney Ghenadie Rusu.
The Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu specializes in a range of legal services, including immigration law and family law. Attorney Ghenadie Rusu brings a wealth of experience and expertise to help clients achieve their legal goals.
Individuals seeking legal assistance in Adjustment of Status (Green Card) or Special Immigrant Juvenile Status cases can take advantage of the free consultation offered by the Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu. This initiative reflects the firm's commitment to making legal services accessible to those who need them.
For more information about the Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu and the free consultation offer, visit their website .
About Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu:
The Law Office of Ghenadie Rusu is a trusted legal practice based in New York, specializing in immigration law and family law. Attorney Ghenadie Rusu is dedicated to providing expert legal counsel and support to individuals facing immigration challenges and family law matters.
